data:
VOCATIONAL TRAINING INSTRUCTORS' DEVELOPMENT
Mobility of staff of Quintessence Enterprises Ltd  Vocational Education and Training Center under the Erasmus+ Program

The Vocational Education and Training Center Quintessence Enterprises Ltd, in its strategy to expand its vocational education and training services is seeking the training of 12 selected instructors to develop their knowledge, skills and competences in a way to be able to provide vocational education and training in the sectors of Laboratory accreditation, viticulture, wine-making and First Aid at Work. The instructors will increase the competency the Centre to cover the training needs in a local, national, regional and international level by the provision of vocational education and training programs in a real environment as well as over the Internet under asynchronous and synchronous education platform.
